etymology.description: 𠈌 (container) + 人(人) (rén, "person") = a person under a container shape -> umbrella
etymology.interpretation: The character 傘 depicts a person beneath a structure resembling a cover or umbrella. This visually represents protection or covering, aligning with the meaning of 'umbrella' or 'shelter.'
etymology.simplification: The traditional character 傘 was simplified to 伞 by replacing 𠈌 with 丷, reducing the number of strokes.

examples.chinese: 她用伞遮阳(她用傘遮陽)。
examples.english: She uses an umbrella to shield from the sun.

examples.chinese: 下雨时(下雨時)，我常带伞(我常帶傘)。
examples.pinyin: Xià yǔ shí, wǒ cháng dài sǎn.
examples.english: When it rains, I always carry an umbrella.

examples.chinese: 暴风雨来临时(暴風雨來臨時)，那把伞成了我的庇护(那把傘成了我的庇護)。
examples.pinyin: Bào fēng yǔ lái lín shí, nà bǎ sǎn chéng le wǒ de bì hù.
examples.english: When the storm comes, that umbrella becomes my shelter.
